model

Class TilesetConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.TilesetConfig

  • public class TilesetConfig
extends java.util.Observable
    Class that contains information about the tilesets loaded in the program
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    Pedro Sampaio

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static TilesetConfig getInstance()
        Returns:
        returns map config instance creates the instance if does not exist yet

      • createTileset

        public Tileset createTileset(java.lang.String name,
                             int tileSize,
                             java.lang.String imagePath,
                             int firstID,
                             int tilecount)
        Creates a Tileset object that represents a tileset to be used on 2D map creation. A tileset is a set of tiles grouped in a single image later to be divided by the size of the tile. Receives all informations for cases of creating a loaded tileset.
        Parameters:
        name - The desired name for the Tileset object to be created
        tileSize - The desired tile size for the Tileset object to be created
        imagePath - The path to the desired image for the Tileset object to be created
        firstID - the id(global - for all tilesets) of the first tile in the tileset
        tilecount - the number of tiles that exists in the tileset
        Returns:
        Returns the created Tileset object with all informations stored or null if image could not be loaded
        Since:
        0.2

      • createTileset

        public Tileset createTileset(java.lang.String name,
                             int tileSize,
                             java.lang.String imagePath)
        Creates a Tileset object that represents a tileset to be used on 2D map creation. A tileset is a set of tiles grouped in a single image later to be divided by the size of the tile
        Parameters:
        name - The desired name for the Tileset object to be created
        tileSize - The desired tile size for the Tileset object to be created
        imagePath - The path to the desired image for the Tileset object to be created
        Returns:
        Returns the created Tileset object with all informations stored or null if image could not be loaded
        Since:
        0.2
